title: Rock Creek Park: Accessibilty
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Carter Barron Amphitheatre     Accessibilty                Carter Barron Amphitheatre accessibility      ACCESSIBILITY Carter Barron is Accessible with Assistance. Wheel chair patrons please note: Carter Barron Amphitheatre is in the process of being renovated. Wheelchair access is currently to the back of the seating area. The path to the center of the seating area is not yet complete. Please contact us for more information. Sign Interpreters are available with at least 2 week notice. Parking for individual with state-issued wheelchair plates or placards is available in marked spaces in the main lot near walkways from the parking lot to the Amphitheatre. There are also marked spaces available along the box office driveway - off of Colorado Avenue, west of 16th Street. For more information please call 202-895-6226 (voice) or email. Updated April 2008.
